bio: Emma Schmidt is a prominent expressionist painter from Berlin, known for her bold use of color and emotional intensity. Her work explores themes of identity, society, and human connection through dynamic compositions and powerful visual narratives.

media.videoPost: Late night session in my Berlin studio. The city lights outside my window inspire my expressionist work. Pouring emotions onto canvas with bold colors and dynamic strokes. Art is my way of processing the world around me. #Expressionism #BerlinArtist #ModernArt
